properties.Name: Tiller
properties.Responsibilities: -- Performed Statistical Analysis on the demography and urbanization, land use, drainage, urban economic base, socio-economic conditions, environmental conditions, social and municipal services & transportation scenario of Barguna Upazila using survey data on SPSS</br>-- Prepared and performed geo-spatial Analysis on high-resolution 2D satellite imageries & 3D Drone imageries using ArcGIS and Erdas Imagine</br>-- Developed a Socio-Economic Report under the project 'Preparation of Payra Kuakata Comprehensive Plan focusing on Eco-Tourism (PKCP)'

properties.Name: NRECA International
properties.Responsibilities: -- Conducted Physical Feature survey & Line Survey of rural electricity delivery of 5 different Palli Bidyut Samity (PBS)s</br>-- Developed and prepared the survey data and other GIS resources of rural electrification for future analysis</br>-- Performed basic geo-spatial analysis on the existing and newly developed GIS data

properties.Name: UNICEF
properties.Responsibilities: Under the supervision of the Programme Manager in Field Services and working closely with Programme Specialists on Urban and Local Governance Program</br>-- Supported on assessing physical features by analysing GIS data</br>-- Performed Geo-spatial analysis on the existing spatial data of Dhaka city</br>-- Conducted field visits to understand existing monitoring system of DNCC Urban Programme Sector</br>-- Prepared and implemented improved monitoring system for DNCC Urban Programme Sector</br>-- Prepared report on the review of data and evidence regarding gaps in coverage, access and utility of basic social services in urban areas</br>-- Supported on the preparation and organisation of advocacy and consultation workshops with service providers, city corporation authorities and other stakeholders on topics related policies and plans on child-responsive service delivery and urban planning</br>-- Collected success stories and lessons learnt of service delivery models piloted by UNICEF Urban Programme
